half life 2: return of half life is freaking awesome!!!! ok below is the story review dont click if u dont want spoilers

[spoiler]
in half life 2 you play as an old man, morgan freeman (AKA "Donny Half-life"). You're having a fun time recycling and riding the train when hijinks ensue! and you have to kill 3000 police officers so you can make it to your smokeshow girlfriend, half life alex. in a freak microwave accident, alex's dad lance vance  is transported to the thunderdome and you have to save him!!! u play basket ball with alexs dog, air bud. then u go to moscow and fight a russian man with a shotgun, AKA vladimir stalin! :D then you ride the boat (best part of the game by far) and then you're on a beach with some ants and then  you're fighting a bunch of big mech bugs (worst part). then you go into the big tower that is futuristically endowed with the slowest Fucking elevator of all time. then you talk to the bad guy and hes like "MYEEEHHH!!! DOCTOR FREEMAN!!! TIME TO KILL THE WORLD" or something i wasnt really paying attention. then you blow up his special orb and then some guy talks about getting off or something
[/spoiler]

anyway, 10/10 cool game!! i hope they make a sequel in the future :D and someone should voice mr freeman next time!!! maybe owen wilson?? :)

Jogo excelente, não é atoa que foi um dos jogos mais inovadores pra época que saiu, mesmo depois de quase 17 anos, ainda é um jogo ótimo, foi a primeira vez que eu joguei esse jogo, ja tinha recebido alguns spoilers antes, mas isso não estragou a minha experiencia, recomendo muito pra quem gosta de jogo singleplayer
melhor jogo que eu já joguei, tudo nele é bom, a historia, a música, os personagens, entre muitas outras coisas. Com certeza recomendo esse jogo incrível chamado half life 2.
